itemInfo.itemDesc:
Food supply for troops in battle.
- Unique effect: 120 minutes of :
 All Attack +5
 Extra Damage Against Human +5
 All Damage Reduction +5
- How to Obtain : Can be cooked at your residence.

item.name: Dark Pudding
item.desc:
A pudding made with suspicious ingredients. 

- Unique Effect: All AP +3 for 90 min
 Damage Against Humans +2 for 90 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Ham Sandwich
item.desc:
A soft bread with sausage placed inside. 

- Unique Effect: All AP +3 for 90 min
All Accuracy +8 for 90 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Meat Croquette
item.desc:
A fried dish with grain and meat. 

- Unique Effect: Combat EXP Increase +5% for 90 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Fruit Wine
item.desc:
Sweet flavored liquor made of fruits. 
- Unique effect: Fishing Speed Rank +1 for 60 min.
- How to Obtain : Can be cooked at your residence.
- Cooldown : 30 min.

item.name: Bloody Dark Pudding
item.desc:
A pudding made with extremely suspicious-looking ingredients. 

- Unique Effect: All AP +3 for 110 min
 Damage Against Humans +2 for 110 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.
